data.title: Enough : : our fight to keep America safe from gun violence
data.meta_description: Former Congresswoman Gabrielle Giffords -- disabled from an assassination attempt in Tucson, Arizona -- and her husband, astronaut Mark Kelly, share their argument for responsible gun ownership and more responsible gun control laws, while being gun owners and staunch supporters of the Second Amendment themselves.
